messages.content:
What are all the scene text in the image and their languages?
![image](https://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/Qwen2-VL/multilingual_1.png)

The text in the image and their respective languages are:

1. "WELCOME" - English
2. "bienvenida" - Spanish
3. "Bienvenue" - French
4. "Willkommen" - German
5. "benvenuto" - Italian
